dmca.title: Danish citizen living in China alleges U.K. defamation
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs		 

We refer to our correspondence by e-mail dated 11 March 2005 in connection to three web pages which are showing when our clients' names are searched through 
google.co.uk and google.dk, namely:

[redacted]

4. Each of the search results identified above contains defamatory information about me that is not permitted under the laws of England and Wales, where publication has taken place.

[redacted]
